example.parse: (VP (PSEUDO_VERB لا) (NP-SBJ (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC بد)) (SBAR-PRD (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (NP-TPC-1 (PRON_2MS ك)) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:2MS سمعت) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (PP-CLR (PREP عن) (S-NOM (VP (NOUN.VN+CASE_DEF_GEN اعتزام) (NP-SBJ (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN وزارة) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الطاقة))) (NP-OBJ (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC وقف) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN استيراد) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN البنزين)) (SBAR (WHNP-2 (-NONE- 0)) (S (VP (DET+ADJ.VN المحتوي) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (PP-CLR (PREP على) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN مادة) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الرصاص))))))))))

arg.g: to stop importing petrol containing lead

example.arg: وقف استيراد البنزين المحتوي على مادة الرصاص
